Individual

class mimic.core.Individual.Individual(x: ndarray, fitness: float | None = None, score: float | None = None, feasible: bool | None = None, age: int = 0, *, att: dict = {})

Bases: object

Class for a individual.

Parameters:

  • x (np.ndarray) – Solution. Shape should be (dim, ).

  • fitness (float) – Objective function value. If None, this solution hasn’t been evaluated.

  • score (float) – Socre. If None, this solution hasn’t been evaluated.

  • feasible (bool) – Feasibility of this solution. If None, this solution hasn’t been evaluated.

  • age (int) – Age

x

Solution. Shape should be (dim, ).

Type:

np.ndarray

fitness

Objective function value. If None, this solution hasn’t been evaluated.

Type:

float

score

Socre. If None, this solution hasn’t been evaluated.

Type:

float

feasible

Feasibility of this solution. If None, this solution hasn’t been evaluated.

Type:

bool

age

Age

Type:

int

att_keys

List of names given from att.

Type:

list[str]

att_dims

List of dimension given from att.

Type:

list[int]

key

Suplemental variables given from att. The name “key” is same with att_keys[i].

Type:

np.ndarray

att_dict() → dict

Return dictionary about additional variables

Returns:

Dictionary about additional variables which is same with att of _init_.

Returns:

Return type:

Dimension of this individual

Parameters:

include_att (bool, optional) – Including additional variables or not. Defaults to False.

Returns:
